titleStmt.title: Canzonets. Or Little short songs to foure voyces: celected out of the best and approued Italian authors. By Thomas Morley, Gent. of her Maiesties chappell. Cantus [-Altus, -Tenor, -Bassus].
titleStmt.author: Morley, Thomas, 1557-1603?

publicationStmt.publisher: By Peter Short, dwelling on Bredstreet hill at the signe of the Star & are there to be sold,

notesStmt.note: Four partbooks, each with separate dated title page and register.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Bredstreet hill at the signe of the Star & are there to be sold
